Clinical guidelines for assessing suitability for UAE in symptomatic fibroids

Patient Assessment

Does the patient have lifestyle-altering symptoms from fibroids?

Has the diagnosis of fibroids been confirmed by imaging?

Have alternative treatments been discussed?

Is the patient experiencing any complications?

Is pain adequately controlled?
